title: How to Make Graham Cracker Dip

steps.headline: Put about 20-30 White Chocolate chips in a small bowl.
Heat it up in the microwave for 25 seconds.
When done get a fork and stir until creamy.
Put two spoons of Skippy Peanut butter in the bowl.
Stir with the spoon to mix the two and also to stir until creamy, again.
Heat that in the microwave for 10-15 seconds
Stir (last time) the Raisins or nuts until covered

text: Put about 20-30 White Chocolate chips in a small bowl. Use a glass bowl Heat it up in the microwave for 25 seconds.  When done get a fork and stir until creamy.  Put two spoons of Skippy Peanut butter in the bowl.  Stir with the spoon to mix the two and also to stir until creamy, again.  Heat that in the microwave for 10-15 seconds  Stir until creamy, yet again.  Add the Raisins or nuts.  Stir (last time) the Raisins or nuts until covered  Enjoy!  Finished.
